metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 禁止 import *

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment

message.value: Blocks-> Empty {0} block.

metadata.value: 限制 代码块 { 的位置

message.value: Blocks-> ''{0}'' should be on a new line.
Blocks-> ''{0}'' should be on the previous line.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 限制 代码块必需使用{}

message.value: Blocks-> ''{0}'' construct must use '''{}'''s.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 限制 代码块 } 的位置

Blocks-> ''{0}'' should be on a new line.
Blocks-> ''{0}'' should be on the same line.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 禁止 条件表达式内联 如: true ? 1 : 2

message.value: Coding Problems-> Avoid inline conditionals.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 限制 equals() 确实覆盖了object.equals(Object obj)

message.value: Coding Problems-> covariant equals without overriding equals(java.lang.Object).

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 限制 switch语句块中,default的位置必需在最后

message.value: Coding Problems-> Default should be last label in the switch.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 限制 类的组成顺序：静态变量(常量)，成员变量，构造，方法

message.value: Coding Problems-> Constructor definition in wrong order.
Coding Problems-> Method definition in wrong order.
Coding Problems-> Instance variable definition in wrong order.
Coding Problems-> Variable access definition in wrong order.
Coding Problems-> Static variable definition in wrong order.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 禁止 空语句 ;

message.value: Coding Problems-> Empty statement.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 禁止 可能为 null.equals("")的调用

message.value: Coding Problems-> String literal expressions should be on the left side of an equals comparison.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 限制 重写equals() 必需重写hashCode()

message.value: Coding Problems-> Definition of ''equals()'' without corresponding definition of ''hashCode()''.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 不用 java编译时已明确要求必需初始化

message.value: Coding Problems-> Variable ''{0}'' explicitly initialized to ''{1}'' (default value for its type).

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 限制 switch中的case在没有break或return等情况下，必须有注释(//fall through)

message.value: Coding Problems-> Fall through from the last branch of the switch statement.
Coding Problems-> Fall through from previous branch of the switch statement.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment
metadata.value: 限制 参数与变量 未修改初始值时,必需定义为final

message.value: Coding Problems-> Variable ''{0}'' should be declared final.

metadata.name: net.sf.eclipsecs.core.comment

message.value: Coding Problems-> ''{0}'' hides a field.

message.value: Coding Problems-> Instantiation of {0} should be avoided.
